Title: Preventative Maintenance
Description:
The Primal Elementals are reproducing unchecked. Ordinarily, my sisters and I would take care of them, but we're in no condition to fight them. We've had so many of our soldiers eliminated. 

Besides, we few that remain have other matters we must look into.
 
<Zuttiki winces in pain.>

That's where you come in, $p. Could you take care of the elementals?
ObjectivesText: Kill 8 Unleashed Elementals in Tyrhold Reservoir.
RewardText: Thank you, $p. That should hold them at bay for now.
